text: Joseph Stephen Salupeza Paduano (born January 22, 1965), also known by his nom de guerre Carapali Lualhalti, is a Filipino politician. He is the House Minority Leader since 2020. He has been the party-list representative for Abang Lingkod since 2014. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Minority leaders of the House of Representatives of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Western Visayas Category:People from Negros Occidental
title: Joseph Stephen Paduano
